Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.GameStates

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.GameStates.GameState
Direct Known Subclasses:
AwaitingReconnectionState, ChooseInitialCardsState, ChooseObjectiveCardsState, PlayerTurnDrawState, PlayerTurnPlayState, VictoryCalculationState
public abstract class GameState extends Object
The abstract base class representing a state in the game. Each specific game state should extend this class and implement its abstract methods.

  • Method Details

    • getStringEquivalent

      public String getStringEquivalent()
      Gets the string representation of this game state.
      Returns:
      The string equivalent of this state.

    • pickObjective

      public void pickObjective(InGamePlayer target, ObjectiveCard objective) throws ForbiddenActionException, AlreadySetCardException, CardNotInHandException
      Picks an objective card for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      target - The player picking the objective card.
      objective - The objective card to be picked.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenActionException - If the action is not allowed in the current state.
      AlreadySetCardException - If the player has already set an objective card.
      CardNotInHandException - If the specified card is not in the player's hand.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(InGamePlayer target, GenericPair<Integer,Integer> position, PlayableCard card, Side playedSide) throws ForbiddenActionException, UnexpectedPlayerException, CardNotInHandException, NotEnoughResourcesException, InvalidCardPositionException
      Places a card at the specified position for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      target - The player placing the card.
      position - The position where the card is to be placed.
      card - The card to be placed.
      playedSide - The side of the card being played.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenActionException - If the action is not allowed in the current state.
      UnexpectedPlayerException - If it is not the specified player's turn.
      CardNotInHandException - If the specified card is not in the player's hand.
      NotEnoughResourcesException - If the player does not have enough resources to place the card.
      InvalidCardPositionException - If the specified position is invalid for placing the card.

    • drawFrom

      public void drawFrom(InGamePlayer target, String deck) throws ForbiddenActionException, UnexpectedPlayerException, UnknownStringException, EmptyDeckException
      Draws a card from the specified deck for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      target - The player drawing the card.
      deck - The name of the deck to draw from.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenActionException - If the action is not allowed in the current state.
      UnexpectedPlayerException - If it is not the specified player's turn.
      UnknownStringException - If the specified deck does not exist.
      EmptyDeckException - If the specified deck is empty.

    • drawFrom

      public void drawFrom(InGamePlayer target, String whichType, int position) throws UnexpectedPlayerException, ForbiddenActionException, InvalidDeckPositionException, UnknownStringException, EmptyDeckException
      Draws a card from the specified deck and position for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      target - The player drawing the card.
      whichType - The type of the deck to draw from.
      position - The position of the card in the deck to draw.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenActionException - If the action is not allowed in the current state.
      UnexpectedPlayerException - If it is not the specified player's turn.
      InvalidDeckPositionException - If the specified position is invalid.
      UnknownStringException - If the specified deck type does not exist.
      EmptyDeckException - If there are no cards at the specified position.

    • playerDisconnected

      public abstract void playerDisconnected(InGamePlayer target)
      Handles the disconnection of a player.
      Parameters:
      target - The player who has disconnected.

    • transition

      public abstract void transition()
      Transitions to the next state.
